description:
This course is designed with 8 lectures each of which is focussed on experiencing maximum happiness everyday.

These lectures explains that by praying God,conditioning your mind to feel good every morning and by feeling that everyday if treated as your birthday you will get happiness everyday.

It also suggests to keep your physical body fit to experience happiness.

One lecture focusses on improving your relationships and friendship by give and take policy to get happiness.

Another lecture gives the importance of your working sincerely and honestly by treating your work with love to get good results and happiness.

It is also said that your hobbies will enhance your happiness and therefore suggest you to have good hobbies and ask you associate yourself with the like minded happy people but not with the trouble making people.

Finally it is suggested to have self purification and self introspection to increase your happiness everyday.
title: Happiness EveryDay:Don't Miss It
